title: Tell Us Your Strategies to Keep Functioning in the Midst of a Migraine
author: Martin Taylor

content: If you’ve experienced migraines for some time, you likely know what your triggers are and how to cope with the pain. Migraine symptoms include sensitivity to light, nausea and vomiting, abdominal pain , and much more than just serious head pain. For someone new to experiencing migraines, managing pain in the midst of a migraine can be overwhelming.
Please share your preventative measures and strategies:
Tell us more about how you cope with migraine pain, including how you prepare for the next attack. Share your response and tag us on social media to keep the conversation going.
bullets: What medications do you use when you start feeling a migraine?
Do you have someone you can turn to for help when the pain or other symptoms become overwhelming?
Did you talk to your doctor to help you identify triggers?
What’s your biggest obstacle to overcome while dealing with your migraines?

meta_description: When a migraine attacks, how do you keep going? Share your strategies for managing migraine and moving forward.
